original_text: Then the people of Israel went and did so; as the Lord had commanded Moses and Aaron, so they did.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 물러가서 그대로 행하되 여호와께서 모세와 아론에게 명령하신 대로 행하니라

sentences.original_text: Then the people of Israel went and did so
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 이스라엘 백성은 가서 그대로 행하였고

sentences.original_text: as the Lord had commanded Moses and Aaron
